name: A Quick Trip
description:
A Quick Trip is a casual, isometric sailing game where you control a small ferry boat.  It's your job to get people where they need to be.  It's important to be punctual-people are relying on you, so you better not let them down!

Collect the islanders and deliver them to the island that matches their color.

*Bug

  • If you collide with the mountains, it may mess with player movement.
  • Menu button is currently broken.
